text: Allahe yi sasya arau catuspada jantu srsti karaiche se'iborara paraa sihamte allahara babe eta ansa nirdista karae arau nijara dharana anuyayi kaya, â€˜e'ito allahara babe arau e'ito amara sbaraikasakalara babeâ€™. Eteke yito sihamtara sbaraikasakalara ansa seya allahara ocarata gai napaya kintu yito allahara ansa seya sihamtara sbaraikasakalara ocarata paumci yaya, sihamte yi phayacala karae seya kimana ye nikrsta
